comment: Excellent teacher. Probably the single most energetic person I've ever met. Loves math and his job, and you can really feel his enthusiasm through his lectures. Extremely fair grader, lectures well and does a great job making sure everybody understands the material. I'm not even a math major and he's still probably my favorite teacher I've had.
HE is awesome and makes sure that you understand everything .

This professor will do everything he can to help you.  His lectures will hold your attention, even through the boring stuff.  He handles his students(especially disruptive ones) with class and respect.  He outlines expectations and shares testing strategies for his tests.  Gives partial credit.  Uses webassign.

Available outside of class to help you work through the homework. His lectures are intense, don't skip, but worth going, he makes Diff Eq a fun. Quizzes are weekly, and cover the homework just turned in and reviewed. Tests are hard. Would definitely take him for any other math class.

well, it's calc II , but dr leblanc makes it better! he has a very quirky sense of humor that will force you to be interested and give that momentary break of laughter during lecture. He explains the material very clearly and is very open to answering questions. My all time FAVORITE prof. Take FULL advantage of his office hours! Tests come from hw

I should have been required to retake CALC II.  It is a hard course all the way around.  Dr. LeBlanc has great lectures, gives homework and quizzes.  The homework and quizzes SAVE YOUR GRADE so complete them fully and do as much as you can even if you don't know the final answer because partial credit is a HUGE deal in his class.  Tests are hard!
My favorite professor of all time!

He's a great math teacher, and will give many different examples.  He doesn't assign much homework(3 problems/week), so you're on your own to do extra problems to learn the material.  Always around for office hours, and if you show up he'll work even the assigned problems with you.  Tests are hard, but he gives lots of partial credit.  Recommend!
Dr. LeBlanc is really good. One of my favorite professors.

This Professor is awesome.  If you don't take him then don't bother being in College.  He will change your life!  I went to class, took notes, and payed attention.  This lead to me passing with a high A! If you don't plan on attending class then college isn't for you!  Take him I highly recommend it!

Took in Summer. Tests were hard but he gives a lot of partial credit. He puts really helpful feedback on the tests, which makes studying for the final easier. You need to study, but he'll definitely help you with anything you ask about. Quizzes are easy and help boost your grade. He gives practice tests too.
Always available during office hours, very good at explaining the material and pretty clear about what we would be tested on. Dropped the lowest quiz and a couple of the homeworks.

He is amazing at explaining the material. If the class grades are low he would give more homework to bring the grades up. Really helpful. His tests are a little bit harder than the problem he solves in class, but if you go to class everyday he will point out during the lecture to the important problems which will be on the tests.

quizzes are like problems from the book but the tests are full of very hard and confusing problems. half of the class failed (he told us). don't take him if you want a good GPA. just another professor that makes a normal class extremely time consuming and difficult.

Great Teacher that is eager to teach. Tests can be difficult if  you don't put in the effort to do  the home work he gives out. He does study guides and reviews for the most part. The homework will only help you if it hurts your grade for the most part he will drop the homework(Sometimes). The Class i took was Calc 2.
